author: Derrick Farwell
comment: Hello!  This looks like a fantastic app.  I am not able to send a match to my phone.  I touch the "Send to Phone" link.  Then I confirms that it will overwrite existing matches on the phone.  Then it gives a message at the bottom that it is moving the match to the phone.  But...nothing shows up on my phone.  I am using a Polar m600, which I believe comes with Android Wear 2.0.  I am able to get other apps to work.  (Nevermind ...I just figured it out)  With Android Wear 2.0, the user needs to manually install the app on the watch in the Google Play app once it's already on your android phone.  Request...I'd still like to be able to add player numbers on the fly on the phone in case a player arrives after kickoff.

reply.author: RefLIVE
reply.content:
Hi Derrick,
Thanks for the great feedback and sorry for the delay in response. Glad to hear that you have figured it out. We would like to hear more about your query about adding player numbers on the fly. Feel free to contact us at support@reflive.com and we can try to work out the best solution for this feature.

author: Jeremy Kraybill
comment: Of all the apps I've tried, this is by far the easiest to use for referees. Does everything I need. And the price is right!

author: Alexander Handley
comment: Awesome app 😍 Best out there for capturing match data. I even love using it for casual matches with friends!

author: Hasan Ljevakovic
comment: Hi guys i went to use the app on the weekend and I ran into a problem when I turned off record substitution. I had a message pop up to confirm the teams have the same starting numbers and could not figure out how to fix this

reply.author: RefLIVE
reply.content:
Hi Hasan,

We have looked into your issue and have found the probable cause. We've released an update that should fix the issue. Sorry for the inconvenience and thank you for bringing the issue to our attention. 

If you have any other questions or issues please don't hesitate to get in touch with us at support@reflive.com.

The RefLIVE Team

author: Tim Hart
comment: Looks really useful, but a few things could really improve it:  Cancel/End match early (thanks for letting me know how to do this) Add Interchange option for lower level games (i.e. let players subbed off be able to sub back on)  Haven't been able to really test yet don't have watch but looks promising

reply.author: RefLIVE
reply.content:
Hi Tim,
Thanks for the feedback. You can cancel or end a match by holding the timer with a long press to bring up extra options. This will also allow you to undo a mistaken event entered or reset time. Let us know if you have any further queries.
Cheers,
The RefLIVE Team

author: Zachary Roberts
comment: The first game it worked perfectly. The tournament match it froze multiple times and froze my phone. I am on a Pixel.

reply.author: RefLIVE
reply.content:
Hi Zachary,

We are very sorry to hear you've had an issue. Could you please email us at support@reflive.com and our tech team will look into the problem for you.

The RefLIVE Team

author: Carli Booma, van
comment: On smartwatch button to add games not visible. Syn with smartphone not operational.  Looks great on smartphone, but this is not useful on the pitch. Carli

reply.author: RefLIVE
reply.content:
Hi Carli,
We are sorry to hear you are having some issues. To add a game you will need to use a smartphone. Once you've created a match & tapped 'Ready', you will see a 'sync to watch' button on the top left corner. Please email us at support@reflive.com if you're still having issues and we will be happy to provide more details.

author: Eric Bright
comment: Very useful, with options to make stats more complex or just ref a simpler, lower level game.  Great app!

reply.author: RefLIVE
reply.content:
Hi Eric,
Thank you for the kind review! 
The RefLIVE Team

author: Ryan Dennis
comment: Not very practical for the field at a lower level because numbers never match names on the TS, if you even get one.  Not to mention, players regularly swap shirts.  I like the idea though.

reply.author: RefLIVE
reply.content:
Hi Ryan,
Thanks for the feedback. We are implementing a quick game function very soon which may help with your player number issue. We’d like to get some further feedback if that’s ok? Can you please email us at support@reflive.com and we can offer further assistance.
Cheers, The RefLIVE Team

author: Simply Football
comment: Aplicación increíble. Me encanta. Muy útil para anotar cualquier incidente en un partido de fútbol al instate. Facilita mucho el trabajo a los árbitros. Es el futuro. Gracias por crearla

author: Marina Ariño Martin
comment: I'm referee. And it's the best app ever. Thanks to make my job easier!!

author: Parm Toor
comment: This is now the app to use. Guys have done what I need. Now as soon as I get the LG Sport watch in Canada. I will pay for the yearly subscription. Thank you guys for making it.

reply.author: RefLIVE
reply.content: Great to hear Parm! Good luck!

author: John Frey
comment: When can we expect it to work with the Tizen o/s?  In the market for a watch and the preference is the S3.  Testing it on my phone for now but the real test is in game mode.

reply.author: RefLIVE
reply.content: Hi John. Hopefully at some stage but not in the short term future. Have you considered/tested all Android Wear compatible watches?

author: Kehan Ryley
comment: Can this app be used on the Samsung Gear S3?

reply.author: RefLIVE
reply.content: Hi Kehan. Samsung Gear uses the Tizen operating system which is currently not compatible with RefLIVE as we use the Android Wear operating system. Sorry for the inconvenience.

author: joe p
comment: Which  after  market  smartwatchs  it  works  on

reply.author: RefLIVE
reply.content: Smartwatches that use Android Wear OS. This article should help https://www.wareable.com/smartwatches/best-android-watch

title: Smartwatch

author: chris ferek
comment: This app wilk change the way referees record match data. So easy to use!
title: Game changer

comment: So simple to use! Highly recommend.
title: Great app

author: Anthony Poh
comment: Promising app.. seems to work well on apple watch. Doesn't seem to work with Samsung Gear watches which is a shame (or at least I couldn't get it working). For some reason couldn't delete a match that was running. Couldn't work out how to end a match either. Promising but needs more work and usability tests.

reply.author: RefLIVE
reply.content:
Hi Anthony,
Thanks for the feedback. Our app is currently not available on Samsing Smartwatches as they a different OS but its something we're looking at creating. When you're in a match, if you long hold the timer screen you have options to end a match. To delete a game, swipe left and the option to delete will appear.
Thanks,
The RefLIVE Team

author: Cade Kuehn
comment: It's a good app, there should be a way to delete teams though.

reply.author: RefLIVE
reply.content:
Hi Cade,
Thanks for the feedback. You can delete teams by swiping the team in the "Pick team" page, and the option to delete will appear.

Thanks,
The RefLIVE Team

author: Family Hatley
comment: Can't use requires login with email.  I don't want the spam.

reply.author: RefLIVE
reply.content:
Hi,
Thanks for the concern.
We only send one can of spam to our referees upon signup to have in sandwiches as a halftime snack, assuming you are referring to the canned meat? If you are referring to email spam, we do not send any spam to any of our users email addresses. You will be much happier using RefLIVE :) 
support@reflive.com

comment: Awesome and easy to use
